text: Every time I run JMeter I have to switch back to english, it is always set to german. I don't know why, my Windows 7 is in english, my windows location is set to united states, only my number formats are set to german, which shouldn't apply here.

text:
@Andras,
I suppose for your issue you need to :
1/ set in jmeter.properties:
language=en
2/ Add System properties:
-Duser.language=en -Duser.country=EN
